description: Doesn't work out of the box, doesn't inform users about how to make it work.

Open Terminal
insert -> sudo add-apt-repository ppa:qbittorrent-team/qbittorrent-stable
insert -> sudo apt update
insert -> sudo apt install qbittorrent
VOILA!
